snippet: AT&T pledged that when Nokia's new Lumia 900 phone went on sale April 8, it would benefit from the company's biggest product introduction ever, exceeding even the iPhone's. The big day is here. But nearly all of the AT&T stores in New York are either...
abstract: AT&T pledged that when Nokia's new Lumia 900 phone went on sale April 8, it would benefit from the company's biggest product introduction ever, exceeding even the iPhone's. The big day is here. But nearly all of the AT&T stores in New York are either closed for Easter or did not answer phone calls.

headline.main: On Release Date, Crucial Nokia Phone Is Hard to Buy in New York
